sentences.sContent: A man twitched the handbag from her hand.
sentences.sContent_eng: A man twitched the handbag from her hand.
sentences.sCn: 一个人从她手中抢走了手提包。

sentences.sContent: The policeman turned the contents of her handbag out onto the table.
sentences.sContent_eng: The policeman turned the contents of her handbag out onto the table.
sentences.sCn: 警察把她手提包里的东西全倒在了桌上。

sentences.sContent: I always have one in my handbag and it has never failed me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I always have one in my handbag and it has never failed me.
sentences.sCn: 我经常在我的手提包里放上一个，并且它从来都没有让我失望。

trans.tranOther: a small bag in which a woman carries money and personal things
